articles.author: Bailey Schulz
articles.title: Vaccinated Americans can enter Canada starting Monday. Here are 11 things to know before a trip. - USA TODAY
articles.description: Canada is opening its borders to vaccinated U.S. travelers on Aug. 9, but tourists will notice a few differences compared to pre-pandemic trips.
articles.content:
Vaccinated American travelers will get the green light to cross Canada's borders on Monday, but the process won't be as simple as it was before the pandemic.
The country has implemented new health m… [+10177 chars]

articles.title: US now averaging 100,000 new Covid-19 infections a day - 1News
articles.description: Health officials fear that cases, hospitalisations and deaths will continue to soar if more Americans don’t embrace the vaccine.
articles.content: The Covid-19 outbreak in the United States crossed 100,000 new confirmed daily infections today, a milestone last exceeded during the pre-vaccine winter surge and driven by the highly transmissible D… [+4982 chars]

articles.title: Joseph Gordon-Levitt has finished filming, but doesn't want to leave Wellington - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: The American actor has finished working on his latest series, made in Wellington, but he's yet to pack his bags.
articles.content:
Its Joseph Gordon-Levitt, sitting in a strange little room somewhere in Miramar.
 Kia ora, he says, in front of a grape-coloured wall.
 Im just really happy to be here.
 Hes talking about New Zeal… [+8100 chars]
